@@ -86,4 +86,4 @@ - *

If this method is invoked after all shutdown hooks have already - * been run and the status is nonzero then this method halts the - * virtual machine with the given status code. Otherwise, this method - * blocks indefinitely. + *

If this method is invoked from more than one thread the status code + * of the first invocation will be used; the status codes from other invocations + * will be ignored. If this method is invoked from a shutdown hook the system + * will deadlock.
